competitors.name: Zendesk
competitors.notes: Established customer service platform, founded 2007, market leader by 2010

competitors.name: Zoho Desk
competitors.notes: Part of Zoho's suite, early cloud-based helpdesk competitor

context: Freshworks (originally Freshdesk) was founded in 2010 in Chennai, India. At launch, the company entered a market already dominated by Zendesk. The competitive landscape was characterized by early cloud-based customer service solutions competing against legacy on-premise systems. Freshdesk positioned itself as more affordable, user-friendly alternative for SMBs.
